item.title: Judge says US deportations to South Sudan violate court order
item.description: The Trump administration says it is deporting eight criminal "monsters", as immigration attorneys challenge the move.

item.title: Trump confronts South African president with claim of Afrikaners being 'persecuted'
item.description: Cyril Ramaphosa responds that black people are likelier to be victims of violence in South Africa than white people.

item.title: 'The mood is changing': Israeli anger grows at conduct of war
item.description: Support for the war in Gaza is waning, with some Israeli political and military figures criticising the conflict in recent days.

item.title: US accepts gifted Qatari plane to join Air Force One fleet
item.description: The White House insists that the gift is legal, but some of Trump's biggest backers have criticised the deal.

item.title: Anti-Hamas protests in southern Gaza enter third day
item.description: Protesters were seen in videos calling for an end to the war and the removal of the armed group from Gaza
